data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Johor, Malaysia. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Johor, Malaysia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 3,348,300 people living in Johor through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 117,809 believers living in the state of Johor. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Johor, Malaysia by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Kanarese people.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Johor to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Johor.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.section_summary:
the state of Johor, Malaysia has a population of 3,348,300.

We estimate Johor has 117,809 people who might know Jesus, 205,916 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,024,575 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 28 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Johor.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
